A brash young reporter discovers he has powers that will change the destiny of the world in a thrilling, futuristic miniseries! The mystery over the global organization code-named Sci-Tech explodes this issue! Ace science reporter Leo Lomax is thrust into the middle of an all-out war between Sci-Tech gunmen and Ninja Metamorphs. As Leo gets more involved, he discovers that he has secret super-powers himself...and now both the Sci-Tech agents and the Naturalists want to capture and study him...dead or alive!
